verbose_text: A HCV genotype specific mechanism of impairment of insulin signaling was observed, since expression of the HCV genotype 3 core protein led to downregulation of PPARgamma and upregulation of SOCS-7, while the core protein of genotype 1 activated mTOR and induced phosphorylation of IRS-1 at inhibitory serine residues [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: genotype 1 activated mTOR and induced phosphorylation of IRS-1 at inhibitory serine residues
